messages.subject: intro.
messages.msgSnippet: hi... dd is 3 and we have unschooled since birth. i have 3 older children ages 23,21 and 19 and wished i had enuf guts years ago to do this with them. i have
messages.messageBody:
hi... dd is 3 and we have unschooled since birth. i have 3 older children ages
23,21 and 19 and wished i had enuf guts years ago to do this with them. i
have questions regarding the state of ohio. if there are any of you out there
who are in ohio, i would love to talk about the requirements here. looking
forward to meeting all of you!
